titles.title: Permanent CFC Look-Through Act of 2014
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the look-through treatment of payments between related controlled foreign corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 14.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 113-428.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 316.

bill.summary: 5/2/2014--Reported to House amended. Permanent CFC Look-Through Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax rule exempting dividends, interest, rents, and royalties received or accrued from certain controlled foreign corporations by a related entity from treatment as foreign holding company income (thus permitting tax deferral of such income).
